sentence: Church & Dwight Company, Inc. ( CHD ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 08, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.31 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 02, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased CHD stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that CHD has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $66.47, the dividend yield is 1.87%.
The previous trading day's last sale of CHD was $66.47, representing a -6% decrease from the 52 week high of $70.71 and a 17.94% increase over the 52 week low of $56.36.
CHD is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
CHD's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.79.
Zacks Investment Research reports CHD's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 8.13%, compared to an industry average of 3.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the CHD Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
